sentence: Looking at options trading activity among components of the S&P 500 index, there is noteworthy activity today in Salesforce.com Inc (Symbol: CRM), where a total volume of 20,011 contracts has been traded thus far today, a contract volume which is representative of approximately 2.0 million underlying shares (given that every 1 contract represents 100 underlying shares).
That number works out to 46.9% of CRM's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 4.3 million shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $130 strike call option expiring June 15, 2018 , with 3,854 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 385,400 underlying shares of CRM.

Below is a chart showing CRM's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $130 strike highlighted in orange:

Express Scripts Holding Co (Symbol: ESRX) options are showing a volume of 15,097 contracts thus far today.
That number of contracts represents approximately 1.5 million underlying shares, working out to a sizeable 45.7% of ESRX's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 3.3 million shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $70 strike put option expiring May 18, 2018 , with 5,691 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 569,100 underlying shares of ESRX.

Below is a chart showing ESRX's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $70 strike highlighted in orange:

And Constellation Brands Inc (Symbol: STZ) saw options trading volume of 5,791 contracts, representing approximately 579,100 underlying shares or approximately 45.5% of STZ's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 1.3 million shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $220 strike call option expiring July 20, 2018 , with 1,741 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 174,100 underlying shares of STZ.

Below is a chart showing STZ's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $220 strike highlighted in orange:
